In this episode of the [Azure Essentials Show](https://www.thomasmaurer.ch/tag/azure-essentials-show/), Thomas is joined by Kailyn and Ben from Azure Marketing for a conversation about [Azure Essentials](https://www.thomasmaurer.ch/tag/azure-essentials-show/), a comprehensive solution developed by Microsoft to help organizations navigate their cloud and AI journeys. The discussion highlights the high failure rate of AI projects, the importance of having robust organizational foundations, and the benefits of Azure Essentials in providing tailored solutions for specific use cases. They also share success stories, such as an Indian airline’s effective use of Azure Open AI services and emphasize the importance of proper planning and guidance in mitigating risks and driving innovation.
